mean_en: one of various types of grass that produce grains that can be eaten or are used to make flour or bread. Wheat, barley and rye are all cereals.
sentence: Wild cereals like rice were among the first crops people farmed.
sentence_trans: 像水稻这样的谷物是人类种植的第一批农作物。
word_etyma: cere谷 + al表名词 → cereal谷物
